Detailed Description

Finds the N highest valued-pixels in image using a levelset implementation.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

Pixel [] edu.ou.asgbook.filters.NHighestLevelSetImpl.findHighestValued ( LatLonGrid  input  )  

00034                                                       {
00035         // create level set
00036         LevelSet levelset = LevelSet.newInstance(input);
00037         
00038         // find the top n pixels
00039         Map.Entry<Integer, List<Pixel>>[] levels = levelset.getLevels();
00040         List<Pixel> result = new ArrayList<Pixel>();
00041         int curr = levels.length;
00042         while (result.size() < nth && curr > 0){
00043             --curr; // next
00044             result.addAll(levels[curr].getValue()); // all pixels at this level
00045         }
00046         
00047         return result.toArray(new Pixel[0]);
00048     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.NHighestLevelSetImpl.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00050                                                             {
00051         // read input
00052         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00053         popdensity.setMissing(0); // will get to process less data this way
00054         
00055         // find 10 highest
00056         NHighestLevelSetImpl filter = new NHighestLevelSetImpl(10);
00057         Pixel[] result = filter.findHighestValued(popdensity);
00058         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00059             System.out.println(i + " " + result[i] + " loc=" + popdensity.getLocation(result[i].getX(), result[i].getY()));
00060         }
00061         
00062         // plot the result on a map
00063         popdensity.fill(popdensity.getMissing());
00064         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00065             popdensity.setValue(result[i].getX(), result[i].getY(), 1);
00066         }
00067         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("levelset");
00068         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "highest10", PngWriter.createHotColormap());
00069         
00070         // plot as KML points
00071         List<LatLon> points = new ArrayList<LatLon>();
00072         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>();
00073         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00074             Pixel p = result[i];
00075             points.add( popdensity.getLocation(p.getRow(), p.getCol()));
00076             names.add("Pixel#"+ (i+1) );
00077         }
00078         KmlWriter.write(points, names, out, "top10pixels");
00079     }
